Description: The iconic mermaid, ARIEL is graceful, optimistic, a little silly, real good at singing, and kind to man and beast alike
An adventurous mermaid with a thirst for knowledge and adveture, NERISSA loves exploring the seabed.
THALASSA is a thoughtful, sensitive mermaid who knows the name of every leaf of seagrass and every cute little fish.
A real wild card, CALYPTRA is here for a good time, and brought the party with her. She has a boombox.
